TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Scroll`使用者變更捲軸的值時，就會發生事件。The `Scroll` event occurs when the user changes the value of the scroll bar. 此事件可能來自各種不同的動作，例如按一下捲軸箭號，按下向上鍵或向下箭號，或拖曳捲動方塊。This event can result from a variety of actions, such as clicking a scroll bar arrow, pressing the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW, or dragging the scroll box. 指定發生的捲動事件型別和捲軸的新值。The specifies the type of scroll event that occurred and the new value of the scroll bar. 使用屬性來判斷捲軸方向`Scroll`事件。Use the property to determine the scroll bar orientation for the `Scroll` event. `Scroll`發生事件， ， ，和控制項。The `Scroll` event occurs for the , , , and controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ScrollableControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ScrollableControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#74)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#74)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會使用屬性來判斷引發的捲軸方向`Scroll`事件，例如使用事件。You would typically use the property to determine the scroll bar orientation that raised the `Scroll` event, such as with the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼至專案，其中包含繼承自類型的執行個體，這類或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ScrollableControl1`，並確保與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then name the instance `ScrollableControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#74)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#74](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#74)]
